grid.description: Primary GRID intelligence framework with RAG and observability

underscore_prefix.rule: Directories starting with underscore (_) are protected system-level directories
underscore_prefix.enforcement: Underscore prefix indicates no modifications allowed

integration_guidelines.reference_only: When integrating between projects, reference paths as read-only sources
integration_guidelines.no_duplication: Do not create copies of protected projects in different locations
integration_guidelines.use_symlinks: Prefer symlinks or references over copies
integration_guidelines.deploy_artifacts: Deploy artifacts to appropriate locations within existing structure
integration_guidelines.document_dependencies: Document cross-project dependencies in project-specific config

metadata.violation_handling: Stop operation and alert user immediately

ai_agent_instructions.always_verify_paths: Before any file operation, verify you're not modifying protected paths
ai_agent_instructions.use_canonical_paths: Always reference canonical paths from this configuration
ai_agent_instructions.never_suggest_moves: Never suggest or execute directory moves for protected projects
ai_agent_instructions.stop_on_violation: Immediately stop and alert user if operation would violate protections
ai_agent_instructions.work_within_structure: Work within existing directory structure, never reorganize
ai_agent_instructions.read_only_references: Treat protected projects as read-only for path operations

current_safe_working_directory.relationship_to_protected: May reference protected projects but must not modify their locations
current_safe_working_directory.allowed_operations: All operations allowed within this directory
